__schemaComment: For fields that are NA (e.g. sourceControl for a closed source project, use null. This comment should not be in manifests.
author: The author/group on source control, Modrinth, or CurseForge, in that order

links.issue: Usually the issues of a sourceControl, unless otherwise stated.
links.sourceControl: git or others, without the .git extension or similar. No mirrors.

others.linkName: The type of link, like "discord", "irc", or "GitHub wiki"

files.fileName: This is usually just cosmetic, should not be relied on for version checking.
files.sha1Hash: The sha1 hash of the jar
downloadUrls: Links should not require any form of user interaction to be downloaded
